title: Client lag?
body: So, my client is really laggy, like so laggy that when its champ select i cant even ban a champion and i accidentally dodge because the time is up. but in game my fps is 50-130 and 80ms, so why is my client so laggy? how do i fix this?

replies.body: It sounds you might be having an unstable connection problem, but I also recommend enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode just in case your client is going through too much stress.  Test it in a custom game, and if that doesn't help then our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should be able to help here.
